title: Textile, 1795–1805
dimensions:
Warp: 184.5cm (72 1/2in.).  Weft: 93cm (36 1/2in.)
Both selvedges present.
Height of repeat: 36cm (14 1/8in.)
description: Stripe of a vase/basket of flowers resting on a framed scnes of a house. with curling ribbons defining the edges of the stripe. In red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1795–1805.
1795–1805. Block-printed on cotton plain weave.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-219.
